snippet: Houston charged back from an 11-point deficit in the final three minutes to beat the Thunder, 104-103, on Tuesday night in Oklahoma City.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Houston Rockets defeat Oklahoma City Thunder, 104-103; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Houston charged back from an 11-point deficit in the final three minutes to beat the Thunder, 104-103, on Tuesday night in Oklahoma City.

headline.seo: Rockets, With Late Rally, Edge the Thunder
headline.main: Down 11 Late, Rockets Edge the Thunder
headline.print_headline: Down 11 Late, Rockets Edge The Thunder
